messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] new to list
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/25/04 3:21:50 PM, damselfly@mosquitonet.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/25/04 3:21:50 PM, damselfly@... writes:

<< I am looking forward to getting support and ideas and my questions
answered about unschooling. >>

This list is often very quiet, but there's more than you could probably read
at some other kinda-related places:

http://sandradodd.com/unschooling
www.unschooling.com

and there's a list (very busy lately) especially for new unschoolers linked
here:

http://sandradodd.com/lists/other

But all that said, throw your questions out here if you want to also!

Sandra

messages.subject: new to list
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, My name is Christine and we live in Fairbanks, Alaska. I signed up for this list just a few days ago and I am looking forward to getting support and ideas
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
My name is Christine and we live in Fairbanks, Alaska.
I signed up for this list just a few days ago and I am looking forward to getting support and ideas and my questions answered about unschooling.
I have read and heard about unschooling for years, but just recently decided it was right for us! We have two boys, one is 9 and one is 11. We have been busy with summer time activities such as biking, jumping on our trampoline, walking down to the river and digging in the mud and playing little league. Summers are so short up here, we just take advantage of every warm, sunny moment!
Looking forward to hearing from all of you!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
